section.p: You were given the message to take to the king by some spies in Golnir. The king takes the coded missive. Cross it off your Adventure Sheet. He hands it to one of his counsellors to read.
‘You have done well in bringing this to me. It is important,’ says the king.

If you have the codeword Deliver, immediately.
If not, read on.
The king goes on, ‘However, I was hoping you had spoken with General Beladai of the allied army by now - we need that citadel. Now go. That is a Royal command!’
You leave, climbing down to the foothills of the mountains. .
